doc.title: 'Doctor Who': The Troughton Years
doc.plot: The late Patrick Troughton's tenure as the star of "Doctor Who" (1963) is commemorated with this special video release hosted by fellow Doctor Who actor Jon Pertwee. The program includes behind the scenes stories, excerpts from rare episodes, and three complete episodes from the late 1960s.
